mapper.select: SELECT A.SITEID,A.SITENAME ,A.BSNO1,A.BSNO2,A.BSNO3 ,REPLACE(CONCAT(A.BSNO1,'-',A.BSNO2,'-',A.BSNO3),'--','') AS BSNO ,CONCAT(A.INCNO1,'-',A.INCNO2) AS INCNO ,A.INCNO1,A.INCNO2 ,A.ADDR1,A.ADDR2,A.ADDR3 ,A.PRSDNAME ,A.MOBILE1,A.MOBILE2,A.MOBILE3 ,REPLACE(CONCAT(A.MOBILE1,'-',A.MOBILE2,'-',A.MOBILE3),'--','') AS MOBILE ,A.FAXTEL1,A.FAXTEL2,A.FAXTEL3 ,REPLACE(CONCAT(A.FAXTEL1,'-',A.FAXTEL2,'-',A.FAXTEL3),'--','') AS FAXTEL ,A.TELNO1,A.TELNO2,A.TELNO3 ,REPLACE(CONCAT(A.TELNO1,'-',A.TELNO2,'-',A.TELNO3),'--','') AS TELNO ,A.EMAIL ,CASE WHEN A.SITESIZE = '1' THEN '대기업' WHEN A.SITESIZE = '2' THEN '중견기업' WHEN A.SITESIZE = '3' THEN '중소기업' WHEN A.SITESIZE = '4' THEN '소기업' END AS SITESIZE_ ,SITESIZE ,(SELECT USERNAME FROM me800010 WHERE USERNO = A.OWNER) AS OWNER_ ,A.OWNER ,A.COTYPE,A.BSCOND,A.BSTYPE ,IF(DATE_FORMAT(A.FREGDATE,'%Y-%m-%d')='1900-01-01','',DATE_FORMAT(A.FREGDATE,'%Y-%m-%d')) AS FREGDATE_ ,A.SITELOGO ,CASE WHEN A.ISDELETE = '0' THEN '사용' WHEN A.ISDELETE = '1' THEN '미사용' END AS ISDELETE_ ,A.ISDELETE ,A.SITEMEMO ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM me810010 WHERE SITEID = A.SITEID) AS TOTALCNT ,(SELECT USERID FROM me800010 WHERE SITEID = #{siteid} AND MASTERYN = 1) AS ADMINID FROM ma900010 A WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO me800010 (SITEID, USERID, USERNAME, USERPASSWORD, EMAIL, CHKAUTH, ENTERDATE, REGDATE, REGUSER, EDTDATE, EDTUSER, MASTERYN ) VALUES (#{siteid}, #{adminid}, #{sitename}, #{adminpassword}, #{email}, 20, NOW(), NOW(), #{owner}, NOW(), #{owner}, 1);

INSERT INTO sys980010 (SITEID, CSTNAME, USERNAME, FROMEMAIL, TOEMAIL, SUBJECT, CONTENT, RLTDATE, REGDATE, REGUSER, EDTDATE, EDTUSER, USERNO) VALUES (#{siteid}, #{cstname}, #{username}, #{fromemail}, #{toemail}, #{subject}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW(), #{managerno}, NOW(), #{managerno}, #{userno});
mapper.update: UPDATE me800010 SET USERPASSWORD = #{userpassword} WHERE SITEID = #{siteid} AND MASTERYN=1 AND USERNO = #{userno}
